attributes.action: TAX ANY BONUS PAID TO BANKERS AT 99%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The greedy bankers have got this country (& others) into a terrible state.  Industry is suffering, people losing their jobs and most of the population are suffering great financial hardship.

I am concerned that the Chancellor will tax the people even more to bring in more money to bail out the banks (again) and also to fund the bankers' bonuses .

I suggest that the Chancellor makes a swift move to bring in legilation to create a new "FINANCIAL SERVICES BONUS" law , the effect of which is to tax such bonuses at 99% (the 1% allows them to keep, say, the first £100 of a bonus per financial year), thereby returning tax-payers hard earned money back to the treasury.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
